title: gOmati tAyE
sahitya:
gOmati tAyE inda varam koDuttaruLvaayE amba


anupallavi

  bhUmiyil pala piravi eDuttAlum ninkoi malar sEvaDi maravaa vaNNam shrI


caraNam    un padam paNivOrkku oru bhayam kiDaiyAden-ruttama bhaktargaL pOTrip-pugazh kETTu tunbam ara shankara nArAyaNan tOL tazhuvum dEvi nin tAL paNindEn ammA
(madhyama kAlam)
shruti purANa sAshtrAgamam ariyEn tuDittunakkut-toNDu puriyavum ariyEn
un tiruvaruLuk-kEnginEn shankaran kOyil valam vara ninaittuhu vanNdEn
